rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
吃肉的频率会增加患结直肠癌的风险吗？研究表明，大量加工肉类摄入量会显着增加结直肠肿瘤风险，其影响相当于遗传风险评分增加 19%，而红肉摄入量则没有显着相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Can-how-often-you-eat-meat-raise-your-risk-of-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Can-how-often-you-eat-meat-raise-your-risk-of-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4189b75a-1146-4038-b38d-b7c07ff78c62 Sun, 11 Aug 2024 23:59:00 -0400 Can how often you eat meat raise your risk of colorectal cancer?
随着 2023 年美国死亡率下降，COVID-19 降至第十大死因2023 年美国临时死亡率数据显示，COVID-19 是第十大死因，在非西班牙裔黑人中总体死亡率最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/COVID-19-drops-to-10th-leading-cause-of-death-as-US-mortality-rates-fall-in-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/COVID-19-drops-to-10th-leading-cause-of-death-as-US-mortality-rates-fall-in-2023.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f68d7e4-524b-4f20-854e-018a17e83026 Sun, 11 Aug 2024 23:29:00 -0400 COVID-19 drops to 10th leading cause of death as U.S. mortality rates fall in 2023
新的蛋白质组时钟可预测不同人群的生物年龄和主要健康风险研究开发了一种利用血浆蛋白准确预测生物年龄和相关健康风险的蛋白质组年龄时钟，为预测与年龄相关的疾病和死亡率提供了强大的工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/New-proteomic-clock-predicts-biological-age-and-major-health-risks-across-diverse-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/New-proteomic-clock-predicts-biological-age-and-major-health-risks-across-diverse-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=208c9f74-d1ab-4096-827b-f615ed0d25b1 Sun, 11 Aug 2024 23:05:00 -0400 New proteomic clock predicts biological age and major health risks across diverse populations
连接压力与肠道细菌的大脑回路揭示了免疫调节的新途径研究人员发现了一种将压力与肠道细菌变化联系起来的脑肠回路，揭示情绪状态可以通过十二指肠腺直接影响免疫功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Brain- Circuits-connecting-stress-to-gut-bacteria-reveal-new-pathways-for-immune-regulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Brain- Circuits-connecting-stress-to-gut-bacteria-reveal-new-pathways-for-immune-regulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=889c95ca-9b77-492f-a396-d01a402e29e0 Sun, 11 Aug 2024 22:25:00 -0400 Brain circuits connecting stress to gut bacteria reveal new pathways for immune regulation
短信程序可以帮助青少年戒掉电子烟吗？研究表明，基于短信的计划可显着提高青少年电子烟使用者的戒烟率，与对照组相比，戒烟率高出 35%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Can-a-text-message-program-help-teens-quit-vaping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Can-a-text-message-program-help-teens-quit-vaping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1fce93b-ea59-47ae-b737-4105737d9f14 Sun, 11 Aug 2024 21:24:00 -0400 Can a text message program help teens quit vaping?
深度学习模型在 MRI 检测前列腺癌方面与放射科医生相媲美研究人员评估了全自动深度学习模型识别具有临床意义的前列腺癌的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Deep-learning-model-rivals-radiists-in-detecting-prostate-cancer-on-MRI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Deep-learning-model-rivals-radiists-in-detecting-prostate-cancer-on-MRI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=400b9d8b-134e-48a7-8174-fdf660a98d2d Sun, 11 Aug 2024 21:03:00 -0400 Deep learning model rivals radiologists in detecting prostate cancer on MRI
热量限制和治疗组合重塑肠道微生物组，促进女性心理健康研究发现，将热量限制与心理干预相结合可以显着改变肠道微生物群，并改善女性与压力相关的心理健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Calorie-restriction-and-therapy-combo-reshapes-gut-microbiome-boosts-mental-health-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Calorie-restriction-and-therapy-combo-reshapes-gut-microbiome-boosts-mental-health-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e8fdd42-57c9-42ec-8e36-d4c7cccfa3fb Sun, 11 Aug 2024 20:55:00 -0400 Calorie restriction and therapy combo reshapes gut microbiome, boosts mental health in women
产前 BPA 暴露与男孩自闭症风险相关研究表明，产前接触 BPA 会扰乱男性大脑中的芳香酶活性，可能导致类似自闭症的症状。 10-HDA 治疗有望逆转这些影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Prenatal-BPA-exposure-tied-to-autism-risk-in-boys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Prenatal-BPA-exposure-tied-to-autism-risk-in-boys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79adae68-c1b6-4686-b81f-01a1cec60c0d Sun, 11 Aug 2024 20:46:00 -0400 Prenatal BPA exposure tied to autism risk in boys
绝育期间的输卵管切除术可能是降低卵巢癌风险的安全选择一项研究显示，通过腹腔镜绝育手术切除输卵管的女性，其手术并发症仅比单纯切除输卵管的女性稍多一些。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Salpingection-during-sterilization-can-be-a-safe-option-to-reduce-ovarian-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Salpingection-during-sterilization-can-be-a-safe-option-to-reduce-ovarian-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2947b613-9757-4857-a55d-7b52debfe29a Sun, 11 Aug 2024 20:20:00 -0400 Salpingectomy during sterilization can be a safe option to reduce ovarian cancer risk
研究表明 ClC-3 交换器中的 ATP 调节与神经退行性疾病有关研究人员从结构上分析了 ClC-3 交换器中的腺嘌呤核苷酸控制和神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/ATP-regulation-in-ClC-3-exchangers-linked-to-neurodogenic-diseases-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/ATP-regulation-in-ClC-3-exchangers-linked-to-neurodogenic-diseases-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bb00d1b-2358-4c56-a124-591743a9f999 Sun, 11 Aug 2024 19:49:00 -0400 ATP regulation in ClC-3 exchangers linked to neurodegenerative diseases, study reveals
